stories.text:
Anyone know why Google home is unable to calculate 135/4 or 135*4

"Hey google, what is 135 times 4" or "hey google what is 135 divided by 4"

Result is always: "I dont know " and shows google search. But it is able to calculate any other number 136/4 or 135/3.

Tried it in Google Smart Display (1st gen)...

Any guesses?
stories.title: Ask HN: Google Home stumbles with simple math if it involves 135

stories.text:
By small startups, I am referring to organisations between the stages of an MVP and a fully professionalised organisation.

How do you as a company starting out, setup your initial infrastructure.

Do you keep your internal network behind a VPN. Self-hosted source control or something like gitlab/github.

When do you setup supporting tools like Email/Chat/Docs

When do you start using paid solutions for things like Backups
stories.title: Ask HN: Small startups of HN, what does your initial infrastructure look like?
